name: Bittersweet Chocolate Maple Bark
author: Bobby Flay
description: This is recipe that feels indulgent but is packed full of healthful ingredients, and it just so happens to be directly from the pages of Bobby Flay's Fit Cookbook. Did you know that Bittersweet Chocolate (that is at least 71% cacao) is actually good for you? It's true!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon coconut oil or extra virgin olive oil
